description.value: Pickpocket's tailoring modifies an existing outfit by adding concealed interior pockets and strategically opened seams for hiding small objects inside the lining. You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to Conceal an Object of light Bulk or less in the pockets. When you get a failure (but not a critical failure, which works as normal) on a Stealth check to Conceal such an Object, observers know you're concealing an object somewhere, but they don't find the object unless they succeed at a @Check[type:perception|dc:20|name:Find a Pickpocket Pocket|showDC:all] check to locate the seams in the garment.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar

rules.label: Conceal an item (L bulk or less) in a Pickpocket's Pocket
